Valormae is a guitarist and composer with a background in classical and jazz music. Passionate about technical prog metal, Valormae blends the harmonic richness of jazz with the thoughtful compositional techniques of classical music. The result is a unique sound that highlights both intricate musicianship and expressive depth. Through a blend of genres and styles, Valormae offers listeners a musical experience that is both technically engaging and artistically compelling.
